award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: À Meia Luz
award_movie.overview: Anos depois de sua tia ser assassinada em sua casa, uma jovem se muda de volta para casa com seu novo marido. No entanto, ele tem um segredo e fará qualquer coisa para protegê-lo mesmo que isso signifique enlouquecer sua esposa.

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: Apenas um Coração Solitário
award_movie.overview: When an itinerant reluctantly returns home to help his sickly mother run her shop, they're both tempted to turn to crime to help make ends meet.

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: A Sétima Cruz
award_movie.overview: In Nazi Germany in 1936 seven men escape from a concentration camp. The camp commander puts up seven crosses and, as the Gestapo returns each escapee he is put to death on a cross. The seventh cross is still empty as George Heisler seeks freedom in Holland.

award_movie.title: Vaidosa
award_movie.overview: A popular e bela Fanny Trellis é forçada a um casamento sem amor com um homem mais velho, o banqueiro judeu Job Skeffington, a fim de salvar seu amado irmão Trippy de uma acusação de peculato e as consequentes complicações previsíveis. (e 10 - Estimado 10 Anos)

award_movie.title: Laura
award_movie.overview: Baseado em um conto de Vera Caspary, este mistério sobre o assassinato da personagem principal mostra um detetive se apaixonando pelo retrato dessa bela vítima. Ele investiga três suspeitos para tentar solucionar o crime: um jornalista, o noivo de Laura, a vítima, e sua tia.

award_movie.title: Desde Que Partiste
award_movie.overview: While husband Tim is away during World War II, Anne Hilton copes with problems on the homefront. Taking in a lodger, Colonel Smollett, to help make ends meet and dealing with shortages and rationing are minor inconveniences compared to the love affair daughter Jane and the Colonel's grandson conduct.

award_movie.title: À Meia Luz
award_movie.overview: Anos depois de sua tia ser assassinada em sua casa, uma jovem se muda de volta para casa com seu novo marido. No entanto, ele tem um segredo e fará qualquer coisa para protegê-lo mesmo que isso signifique enlouquecer sua esposa.

award_movie.title: Desde Que Partiste
award_movie.overview: While husband Tim is away during World War II, Anne Hilton copes with problems on the homefront. Taking in a lodger, Colonel Smollett, to help make ends meet and dealing with shortages and rationing are minor inconveniences compared to the love affair daughter Jane and the Colonel's grandson conduct.

award_movie.title: Vaidosa
award_movie.overview: A popular e bela Fanny Trellis é forçada a um casamento sem amor com um homem mais velho, o banqueiro judeu Job Skeffington, a fim de salvar seu amado irmão Trippy de uma acusação de peculato e as consequentes complicações previsíveis. (e 10 - Estimado 10 Anos)

award_movie.title: Mrs. Parkington, A Mulher Inspiração
award_movie.overview: In this family saga, Mrs. Parkington recounts the story of her life, beginning as a hotel maid in frontier Nevada where she is swept off her feet by mine owner and financier Augustus Parkington. He moves them to New York, tries to remake her into a society woman, and establishes their home among the wealthiest of New York's high society. Family and social life is not always peaceful, however, and she guides us, in flashbacks, through the rises and falls of the Parkington family fortunes.

award_movie.title: Pacto de Sangue
award_movie.overview: Um agente de seguros encontra a atraente (e casada) Phyllis quando vai efetuar um negócio e ambos logo se apaixonam. Phyllis o convence a efetuar um plano para assassinar seu marido após fazer um seguro de vida para ele. O objetivo? Ficar com o dinheiro do seguro. Mas nem tudo dá certo na execução do plano. (Estimado e 14)

award_movie.overview: The lives of a small Chinese village are turned Upside down when the Japanese invade it. An heroic young Chinese woman leads her fellow villagers in an uprising against Japanese Invaders.

award_movie.title: Casanova Júnior
award_movie.overview: O casamento de Cass Brown e Isabel é cancelado. E, quando ele está prestes a se casar com outra mulher, descobre que Isabel está grávida. Para que ela não entregue o bebê para adoção, Cass rapta a criança e passa a cuidar dela. Mas será que este é um plano para reconquistá-lo?

award_movie.title: Climax
award_movie.overview: Dr. Hohner, theatre physician at the Vienna Royal Theatre, murders his mistress, the star soprano when his jealousy drives him to the point of mad obsession. Ten years later, another young singer reminds Hohner of the late diva and his old mania kicks in. Hohner wants to prevent her from singing for anyone but him, even if it means silencing her forever.

Art Direction (Color).first_label: Art Direction: Lionel Banks, Cary Odell; Interior Decoration: Fay Babcock

award_movie.title: Modelos
award_movie.overview: Ao vencer concurso de beleza, jovem dançarina deixa o namorado para trás a fim de trabalhar como modelo. Mas descobre que o sucesso não substitui um grande amor.  No Brooklyn, a dançarina de cabaré Rusty Parker tem uma vida simples mas feliz dançando no McGuire, cabaré de propriedade de seu namorado Danny. Rusty, Danny e Genius tem um ritual nas noites de sexta-feira: eles encomendam ostras em um bar, tentando encontrar uma pérola. A vida de Rusty muda quando ela participa e ganha um concurso para ser a garota da capa da revista Vanity. Ela é convidada a trabalhar em um grande teatro na Broadway, cujo proprietário propõe se casar com ela. Ela perde a felicidade e começa a beber em seu novo estilo de vida, sem o amor de Danny e seus velhos amigos.

Art Direction (Color).first_label: Art Direction: Charles Novi; Interior Decoration: Jack McConaghy
Art Direction: Cedric Gibbons, Daniel B. Cathcart; Interior Decoration: Edwin B. Willis, Richard Pefferle

award_movie.title: Kismet
award_movie.overview: Hafiz, a rascally beggar on the periphery of the court of Baghdad, schemes to marry his daughter to royalty and to win the heart of the queen of the castle himself.

Art Direction (Color).first_label: Art Direction: Hans Dreier, Raoul Pene du Bois; Interior Decoration: Ray Moyer

award_movie.title: Lady in the Dark
award_movie.overview: A neurotic editor sees a psychoanalyst about the advertising man, movie star and other man in her life.

Art Direction (Color).first_label: Art Direction: Ernst Fegte; Interior Decoration: Howard Bristol

award_movie.title: The Princess and the Pirate
award_movie.overview: Princess Margaret is travelling incognito to elope with her true love instead of marrying the man her father has betrothed her to. On the high seas, her ship is attacked by pirates who know her identity and plan to kidnap her and hold her for a king's ransom.

award_movie.title: Um Barco e Nove Destinos
award_movie.overview: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial no Atlântico, um navio e um barco alemão se envolvem em um combate e ambos naufragam, mas existem alguns sobreviventes que vão para um dos botes. No entanto, eles têm diferentes origens e propósitos, mas surge o pomo da discórdia quando um dos sobreviventes se revela um nazista.

award_movie.title: Desde Que Partiste
award_movie.overview: While husband Tim is away during World War II, Anne Hilton copes with problems on the homefront. Taking in a lodger, Colonel Smollett, to help make ends meet and dealing with shortages and rationing are minor inconveniences compared to the love affair daughter Jane and the Colonel's grandson conduct.

award_movie.title: Trinta Segundos Sobre Tóquio
award_movie.overview: A verdadeira e incrivelmente detalhada história de "O Raid de Doolittle", baseado no relato pessoal de Ted Lawson, um dos participantes do Raid. Atordoados pelo ataque a Pearl Harbor e uma série de outras derrotas, a América precisava de uma vitória. Para isso o coronel Jimmy Doolittle, um campeão de corrida aérea e piloto de acrobacias, elabora um plano para um ataque ousado ao coração do próprio Japão. Para fazer isso, ele deve treinar pilotos de bombardeiro do exército para fazer algo que ninguém jamais sonhou ser possível, o lançamento de 16 bombardeiros B-25, totalmente carregados de combustível e bombas, a partir de um porta-aviões! Notável em sua exatidão, este filme ainda usa imagens filmadas do raid real.

award_movie.title: O Solar das Almas Perdidas
award_movie.overview: A brother and sister move into an old seaside house that has been abandoned for many years on the Cornwellian coast only to soon discover that it is haunted by the ghost of the mother of their neighbor's granddaughter, with whom the brother has fallen in love.

award_movie.title: Evocação
award_movie.overview: American Susan travels with her father to England for a vacation. Invited to a society ball, Susan meets Sir John Ashwood and marries him after a whirlwind romance. However, she never quite adjusts to life as a new member of the British gentry. At the outbreak of World War I, John is sent to the trenches and never returns. When her son goes off to fight in World War II, Susan fears the same tragic fate may befall him too.

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

tmdb.title: Modelos
tmdb.overview: Ao vencer concurso de beleza, jovem dançarina deixa o namorado para trás a fim de trabalhar como modelo. Mas descobre que o sucesso não substitui um grande amor.  No Brooklyn, a dançarina de cabaré Rusty Parker tem uma vida simples mas feliz dançando no McGuire, cabaré de propriedade de seu namorado Danny. Rusty, Danny e Genius tem um ritual nas noites de sexta-feira: eles encomendam ostras em um bar, tentando encontrar uma pérola. A vida de Rusty muda quando ela participa e ganha um concurso para ser a garota da capa da revista Vanity. Ela é convidada a trabalhar em um grande teatro na Broadway, cujo proprietário propõe se casar com ela. Ela perde a felicidade e começa a beber em seu novo estilo de vida, sem o amor de Danny e seus velhos amigos.

award_movie.title: Home in Indiana
award_movie.overview: 'Sparke' Thorton, a lad with a penchant for trouble, is sent to live with his Uncle and Aunt Bolt in Indiana after his Aunt Henrietta Bolt dies. Though he's not happy about the arrangement at first, his love of horses and his affection for a young filly that he plans to race make life bearable. He also finds romance with tomboyish 'Char' Bruce who shares his love for horses.

award_movie.title: Kismet
award_movie.overview: Hafiz, a rascally beggar on the periphery of the court of Baghdad, schemes to marry his daughter to royalty and to win the heart of the queen of the castle himself.

award_movie.title: Agora Seremos Felizes
award_movie.overview: No ano que antecedeu a Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904, as quatro filhas dos Smith aprendem lições de vida e amor, mesmo que se preparem para uma mudança relutante para Nova York. Agora Seremos Felizes é muito mais que um musical. É a encantadora história de uma família na virada do século, repleta de magias e recordações. Judy Garland é Esther Smith, uma garota da agitada cidade de St. Louis que, junto com sua família, tem que se mudar para Nova York. Como se não bastasse deixar todos os seus amigos para trás, ela ainda irá perder a sensacional Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904. Esther precisa fazer alguma coisa para evitar essa tragédia!

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

tmdb.original_title: The Chronicle History of King Henry the Fifth with His Battell Fought at Agincourt in France
tmdb.title: Henrique V
tmdb.overview: Henrique V (Laurence Olivier) foi o rei da Inglaterra de 1413 até 1422, e se envolveu em um episódio heróico e patriótico. Ele partiu em uma pequena expedição até a França para reivindicar a coroa daquela nação. Só que quando ele chegou a Agingcourt, foi recebido pelo vasto exército francês, que não estava nem um pouco disposto a deixá-lo passar.

award_movie.title: The Fighting Lady
award_movie.overview: Oscar winner William Wyler directed this 1944 "newsdrama," narrated by Lieut. Robert Taylor, USNR (Bataan), and photographed in zones of combat by the U.S. Navy. The film follows one of the many new aircraft carriers built since Pearl Harbor, known as THE FIGHTING LADY in honor of all American carriers, as it goes into action against the Japanese in the Pacific Ocean in 1943. See the ship and its pilots undergo their baptism of fire, attacking the Japanese base on Marcus Island.  Preserved by the Academy Film Archive in partnership with The Film Foundation.

award_movie.title: Resisting Enemy Interrogation
award_movie.overview: A downed American bomber crew quickly falls prey to the clever interrogation techniques of the Germans in this dramatic training film.

award_movie.title: With the Marines at Tarawa
award_movie.overview: Documentary short film depicting the harrowing battle between the U.S. Marines and the Japanese for control of the Pacific island of Tarawa.

Documentary (Short Subject).first_label: United States Office of War Information Overseas Motion Picture Bureau

award_movie.title: Hymn of the Nations
award_movie.overview: Hymn of the Nations, originally titled Arturo Toscanini: Hymn of the Nations, is a 1944 film directed by Alexander Hammid, which features the "Inno delle nazioni," a patriotic work for tenor soloist, chorus, and orchestra, composed by Italian opera composer Giuseppe Verdi in the early 1860s. (For this musical work, Verdi utilized the national anthems of several European nations.) In December 1943, Arturo Toscanini filmed a performance of this music for inclusion in an Office of War Information documentary about the role of Italian-Americans in aiding the Allies during World War II. Toscanini added a bridge passage to include arrangements of "The Star-Spangled Banner" for the United States and "The Internationale" for the Soviet Union and the Italian partisans. Joining Toscanini in the filmed performance in NBC Studio 8-H, were tenor Jan Peerce, the Westminster Choir, and the NBC Symphony Orchestra.  Preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2010.

award_movie.title: New Americans
award_movie.overview: Part of RKO's "This is America" series, this is an Oscar nominated short documentary from 1944 that follows the plight of European immigrants arriving in the USA looking for hope and safety.

award_movie.title: Férias de Natal
award_movie.overview: Don't be fooled by the title. Christmas Holiday is a far, far cry from It's a Wonderful Life. Told in flashback, the story begins as Abigail Martin marries Southern aristocrat Robert Monette. Unfortunately, Robert has inherited his family's streak of violence and instability, and soon drags Abigail into a life of misery.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Romance dos Sete Mares
award_movie.overview: Na WW2 no Pacífico trabalhadores da construção civil são necessários para construir instalações militares, mas o trabalho é perigoso e eles duvidam da capacidade da Marinha para protegê-los. Depois de uma série de ataques por parte dos japoneses algo novo é tentado, os Batalhões de Construção, em inglês Construction Battalions (CBs = Seabees) Abelhas do Mar. O novo batalhão tem tanto que construir quanto estar pronto para lutar.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: O Grande Bruto
award_movie.overview: Aboard ship, a spoiled woman (Susan Hayward) insults the brutish stoker (William Bendix) while watching him work.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: O Tempo é uma Ilusão
award_movie.overview: A young turn-of-the-century newspaper man finds he can get hold of the next day's paper. This brings more problems than fortune, especially as his new girlfriend is part of a phony clairvoyant act.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: The Lodger
award_movie.overview: In Victorian era London, the inhabitants of a family home with rented rooms upstairs fear the new lodger is Jack the Ripper.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Kismet
award_movie.overview: Hafiz, a rascally beggar on the periphery of the court of Baghdad, schemes to marry his daughter to royalty and to win the heart of the queen of the castle himself.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Apenas um Coração Solitário
award_movie.overview: When an itinerant reluctantly returns home to help his sickly mother run her shop, they're both tempted to turn to crime to help make ends meet.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: The Princess and the Pirate
award_movie.overview: Princess Margaret is travelling incognito to elope with her true love instead of marrying the man her father has betrothed her to. On the high seas, her ship is attacked by pirates who know her identity and plan to kidnap her and hold her for a king's ransom.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: O Que Matou Por Amor
award_movie.overview: It's a tale of power and passions when a Russian siren, who wants the finer things in life, sinks her hooks into a judge, a decadent aristocrat and an estate superintendent, with surprising results.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)
Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Up in Mabel's Room
award_movie.overview: Newly-married Gary Ainsworth (Dennis O'Keefe) once gave his former sweetheart Mabel (Gail Patrick) a sexy negligee with his initials embroidered in the lacework. It is Gary's unenviable task to retrieve the incriminating undergarment from Mabel's room before his wife Geraldine (Marjorie Reynolds) gets wise.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Uma Voz na Tormenta
award_movie.overview: Former concert pianist, victim of Nazi torture, pursues a confused, melancholic existence on the island of Guadalupe.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Come.category: Music (Music Score of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture)

award_movie.title: Modelos
award_movie.overview: Ao vencer concurso de beleza, jovem dançarina deixa o namorado para trás a fim de trabalhar como modelo. Mas descobre que o sucesso não substitui um grande amor.  No Brooklyn, a dançarina de cabaré Rusty Parker tem uma vida simples mas feliz dançando no McGuire, cabaré de propriedade de seu namorado Danny. Rusty, Danny e Genius tem um ritual nas noites de sexta-feira: eles encomendam ostras em um bar, tentando encontrar uma pérola. A vida de Rusty muda quando ela participa e ganha um concurso para ser a garota da capa da revista Vanity. Ela é convidada a trabalhar em um grande teatro na Broadway, cujo proprietário propõe se casar com ela. Ela perde a felicidade e começa a beber em seu novo estilo de vida, sem o amor de Danny e seus velhos amigos.

award_movie.title: Brazil
award_movie.overview: Brazil is perhaps the best of the handful of US films made by Brazilian singing sensation Tito Guizar. In typical screwball-comedy fashion, the plot is set in motion by authoress Nicky Henderson, who has hit the best-seller charts with her latest tome, Why Marry a Latin? While researching her next book in Rio De Janeiro, she finds out "why" when she meets handsome songwriter Miguel Soares. Upon learning about Nicky's book, Miguel decides to teach her a few lessons in the affairs of the heart. Edward Everett Horton is also on hand, twittering his way through the role of a well-meaning buttinsky. Thanks to the "Good Neighbor" policy of the 1940s, South American musicals were a glut on the market, but Brazil was good enough on its own merits to pay its way at the box office.

award_movie.title: Um Sonho em Hollywood
award_movie.overview: Two soldiers on leave spend three nights at a club offering free of charge food, dancing, and entertainment for servicemen on their way overseas. Club founders Bette Davis and John Garfield give talks on the history of the place.

award_movie.title: Irish Eyes Are Smiling
award_movie.overview: Climbing to fame, Irish-American composer Ernest R. Ball romances a showgirl, who catches the eye of an underworld character.

award_movie.title: Knickerbocker Holiday
award_movie.overview: The wild and woolly early days of New York -- when it was still known as New Amsterdam -- provide the backdrop for this period musical-comedy. In 1650, Peter Stuyvesant (Charles Coburn) arrives in New Amsterdam to assume his duties as governor. Stuyvesant is hardly the fun-loving type, and one of his first official acts is to call for the death of Brom Broeck (Nelson Eddy), a newspaper publisher well-known for his fearless exposes of police and government corruption. However, Broeck hasn't done anything that would justify the death penalty, so Stuyvesant waits (without much patience) for Broeck to step out of line. Broeck is romancing a beautiful woman named Tina Tienhoven (Constance Dowling), whose sister Ulda (Shelley Winters) happens to be dating his best friend, Ten Pin (Johnnie "Scat" Davis). After Stuyvesant's men toss Broeck in jail on a trumped-up charge, Stuyvesant sets his sights on winning Tina's affections.

award_movie.title: Lady in the Dark
award_movie.overview: A neurotic editor sees a psychoanalyst about the advertising man, movie star and other man in her life.

award_movie.title: Dançarina Loura
award_movie.overview: Singing, dancing, and ice skating are featured in this musical that focuses on ice-skating sensation Belita. The story begins as she travels to a California resort where she has been hired as a replacement for a dance team. The resort is run by a handsome fellow. As a result of the gig, the skater becomes a national star while the resort manager gets fired and becomes a drifter until he ends up in the Army. The Oscar nominated score includes the following songs: "Silver Shadows and Golden Dreams", "Dream of Dreams", "Rio", "In the Days of Beau Brummel", "Lady, Let's Dance", "Happy Hearts", "Ten Million Men and a Girl", and the rhumba standard "Esperanza".

award_movie.title: Agora Seremos Felizes
award_movie.overview: No ano que antecedeu a Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904, as quatro filhas dos Smith aprendem lições de vida e amor, mesmo que se preparem para uma mudança relutante para Nova York. Agora Seremos Felizes é muito mais que um musical. É a encantadora história de uma família na virada do século, repleta de magias e recordações. Judy Garland é Esther Smith, uma garota da agitada cidade de St. Louis que, junto com sua família, tem que se mudar para Nova York. Como se não bastasse deixar todos os seus amigos para trás, ela ainda irá perder a sensacional Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904. Esther precisa fazer alguma coisa para evitar essa tragédia!

award_movie.title: The Merry Monahans
award_movie.overview: The film concerns a family vaudeville troupe headed by patriarch Pete Monahan. Because of his love affair with the bottle, Pete manages to get himself and his family blacklisted from every major vaude house in the country. Though Pete's kids Jimmy and Patsy love their dad, they're forced to break away from the act and go off on their own to survive. Eventually, the whole gang is reunited in a shamelessly lachrymose musical finale.

award_movie.title: Minstrel Man
award_movie.overview: Unusually elaborate for a PRC film, Minstrel Man is a lively musical drama built around the talents of veteran vaudevillian Benny Fields. The star is cast as Dixie Boy Johnson, who rises from the ranks of minstrel shows to become a top Broadway attraction. On the opening night of his greatest stage triumph, Dixie Boy's wife dies in childbirth. Profoundly shaken, he walks out of the show, leaving the baby to be raised by his showbiz pals Mae and Lasses White (Gladys George, Roscoe Karns). The kid grows up to be an attractive young woman named Caroline (Judy Clark), who follows in her dad's footsteps by billing herself as-that's right-Dixie Girl Johnson. This leads to a tearful reunion between Caroline and the father she'd long assumed to be dead. If Minstrel Man seems at times to be a dress rehearsal for Columbia's The Jolson Story (1946), it shouldn't surprising: the PRC film was directed by Joseph H. Lewis, who went on to helm Jolson Story's musical highlights.

award_movie.title: Sensations of 1945
award_movie.overview: As dancer Ginny Walker performs on stage, a veiled woman in the audience stands up, accuses Ginny of stealing her husband and then fires a gun at her. After Ginny collapses and is taken to her dressing room, the woman, Julia Westcolt, a friend of Ginny's, dashes backstage, discards her veil, and then congratulates her friend on their successful publicity stunt. When Ginny's press agents, Gus Crane and his son Junior, visit their client backstage, she brags about her feat and chides them for not being more creative in promoting her. Horrified at Ginny's brashness, Junior, a conservative Harvard graduate, chastises her and leaves the room.

award_movie.title: Song of the Open Road
award_movie.overview: A beautiful child star tires of life in the spotlight and so disguises herself and sneaks off to join a Civilian Conservation Corps camp to work with normal kids. It doesn't take her long to discover that being "normal" isn't easy as it looks. When a crop is in danger of being ruined because there are not enough people to harvest it, the girl employs some of her famous colleagues to lend a hand.  Songs include: "Too Much in Love," "Here It Is Monday," "Delightfully Dangerous," "Hawaiian War Chant" and "Notre Dame."

award_movie.title: Up in Arms
award_movie.overview: Hypochondriac Danny Weems gets drafted and accidentally smuggles his girlfriend aboard his Pacific-bound troopship.

Music (Song).first_label: Swinging On A Star in "Going My Way" Music by James Van Heusen; Lyrics by Johnny Burke

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

Music (Song).first_label: I Couldn't Sleep A Wink Last Night in "Higher and Higher" Music by Jimmy McHugh; Lyrics by Harold Adamson
I'll Walk Alone in "Follow the Boys" Music by Jule Styne; Lyrics by Sammy Cahn

award_movie.title: Epopeia da Alegria
award_movie.overview: During World War II, all the studios put out "all-star" vehicles which featured virtually every star on the lot--often playing themselves--in musical numbers and comedy skits, and were meant as morale-boosters to both the troops overseas and the civilians at home. This was Universal Pictures' effort. It features everyone from Donald O'Connor to the Andrews Sisters to Orson Welles to W.C. Fields to George Raft to Marlene Dietrich, and dozens of other Universal players.

Music (Song).first_label: I'm Making Believe in "Sweet and Lowdown" Music by James V. Monaco; Lyrics by Mack Gordon

award_movie.title: Sweet and Low-Down
award_movie.overview: After their annual free concert at Chicago's Dearborn Settlement, Benny Goodman and his band are packing up to go to their next engagement when a kid steals Goodman's clarinet. Goodman and Popsie pursue him to a tenement flat where he has led them to hear his brother play the trombone. Shenanigans ensue following Goodman's offering the brother a job with the band.

Music (Song).first_label: Long Ago And Far Away in "Cover Girl" Music by Jerome Kern; Lyrics by Ira Gershwin

award_movie.title: Modelos
award_movie.overview: Ao vencer concurso de beleza, jovem dançarina deixa o namorado para trás a fim de trabalhar como modelo. Mas descobre que o sucesso não substitui um grande amor.  No Brooklyn, a dançarina de cabaré Rusty Parker tem uma vida simples mas feliz dançando no McGuire, cabaré de propriedade de seu namorado Danny. Rusty, Danny e Genius tem um ritual nas noites de sexta-feira: eles encomendam ostras em um bar, tentando encontrar uma pérola. A vida de Rusty muda quando ela participa e ganha um concurso para ser a garota da capa da revista Vanity. Ela é convidada a trabalhar em um grande teatro na Broadway, cujo proprietário propõe se casar com ela. Ela perde a felicidade e começa a beber em seu novo estilo de vida, sem o amor de Danny e seus velhos amigos.

Music (Song).first_label: Now I Know in "Up in Arms" Music by Harold Arlen; Lyrics by Ted Koehler

award_movie.title: Up in Arms
award_movie.overview: Hypochondriac Danny Weems gets drafted and accidentally smuggles his girlfriend aboard his Pacific-bound troopship.

Music (Song).first_label: Remember Me To Carolina in "Minstrel Man" Music by Harry Revel; Lyrics by Paul Webster

Music (Song).first_label: Sweet Dreams Sweetheart in "Hollywood Canteen" Music by M. K. Jerome; Lyrics by Ted Koehler

award_movie.overview: Two soldiers on leave spend three nights at a club offering free of charge food, dancing, and entertainment for servicemen on their way overseas. Club founders Bette Davis and John Garfield give talks on the history of the place.

award_movie.title: Song of the Open Road
award_movie.overview: A beautiful child star tires of life in the spotlight and so disguises herself and sneaks off to join a Civilian Conservation Corps camp to work with normal kids. It doesn't take her long to discover that being "normal" isn't easy as it looks. When a crop is in danger of being ruined because there are not enough people to harvest it, the girl employs some of her famous colleagues to lend a hand.  Songs include: "Too Much in Love," "Here It Is Monday," "Delightfully Dangerous," "Hawaiian War Chant" and "Notre Dame."

Music (Song).first_label: The Trolley Song in "Meet Me in St. Louis" Music and Lyrics by Ralph Blane and Hugh Martin

award_movie.title: Agora Seremos Felizes
award_movie.overview: No ano que antecedeu a Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904, as quatro filhas dos Smith aprendem lições de vida e amor, mesmo que se preparem para uma mudança relutante para Nova York. Agora Seremos Felizes é muito mais que um musical. É a encantadora história de uma família na virada do século, repleta de magias e recordações. Judy Garland é Esther Smith, uma garota da agitada cidade de St. Louis que, junto com sua família, tem que se mudar para Nova York. Como se não bastasse deixar todos os seus amigos para trás, ela ainda irá perder a sensacional Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904. Esther precisa fazer alguma coisa para evitar essa tragédia!

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: Pacto de Sangue
award_movie.overview: Um agente de seguros encontra a atraente (e casada) Phyllis quando vai efetuar um negócio e ambos logo se apaixonam. Phyllis o convence a efetuar um plano para assassinar seu marido após fazer um seguro de vida para ele. O objetivo? Ficar com o dinheiro do seguro. Mas nem tudo dá certo na execução do plano. (Estimado e 14)

award_movie.title: À Meia Luz
award_movie.overview: Anos depois de sua tia ser assassinada em sua casa, uma jovem se muda de volta para casa com seu novo marido. No entanto, ele tem um segredo e fará qualquer coisa para protegê-lo mesmo que isso signifique enlouquecer sua esposa.

award_movie.title: Desde Que Partiste
award_movie.overview: While husband Tim is away during World War II, Anne Hilton copes with problems on the homefront. Taking in a lodger, Colonel Smollett, to help make ends meet and dealing with shortages and rationing are minor inconveniences compared to the love affair daughter Jane and the Colonel's grandson conduct.

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

award_movie.title: A Caça ao Rato
award_movie.overview: O novo livro de Tom sobre "como apanhar um rato" não se revela muito útil contra Jerry; na verdade, Jerry parece utilizá-lo melhor do que Tom.

Short Subject (Cartoon).second_label: And to Think I Saw It on Mulberry Street

award_movie.original_title: And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street
award_movie.title: And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street
award_movie.overview: 1944 animated short film by George Pal, based on the book by Dr. Seuss.

award_movie.title: Peixe Frito
award_movie.overview: Um gato de rua tenta roubar o peixinho dourado que Andy Panda acabou de comprar em uma loja de animais, mas o peixe se mostra inteligente demais para ele.

award_movie.title: Como Jogar Futebol Americano
award_movie.overview: A turma do Pateta ensina como jogar futebol americano, em um jogo emocionante entre os times da Taxidermia e da Antropologia.

award_movie.title: My Boy Johnny
award_movie.overview: In a departure from the usual Terrytoon, this short is based on predictions of things to come in the world after the end of World War II. It primarily deals with, in a comedy sense, what every "G.I." Jonnny can expect when he returns home to civilian life.

award_movie.title: Swooner Crooner
award_movie.overview: Porky Pig's egg faces production problems when a crooning rooster distracts the hens from their jobs.

award_movie.title: Who's Who in Animal Land
award_movie.overview: An Academy award-winning Paramount Headliner short featuring a tour of the animal kingdom with the animals tossing around quips and jokes via dubbing and special effects. The narration is by Ken Carpenter, and the ending is a rendition of "Cow-Cow Boogie" by a "cow soloist" and some cow-pasture harmonizers.

award_movie.title: Blue-Grass Gentlemen
award_movie.overview: Blue-Grass Gentlemen is a 1944 English language short film, starring Ed Thorgersen. It was nominated for an Oscar in the category Best Short Subject, One-Reel.

award_movie.title: Jammin' the Blues
award_movie.overview: In this short film, prominent jazz musicians of the 1940s gather for a rare filming of a jam session. This highly stylized chronicle features tenor sax legend Lester Young.

award_movie.title: Movie Pests
award_movie.overview: This Pete Smith Specialty short takes a humorous look at the inconsiderate pests whose annoying habits make enjoying a movie impossible.

Short Subject (One-reel).second_label: Screen Snapshots' 50th Anniversary of Motion Pictures

award_movie.original_title: Screen Snapshots' 50th Anniversary of Motion Pictures
award_movie.title: Screen Snapshots' 50th Anniversary of Motion Pictures
award_movie.overview: 1944 short film nominated for an Oscar in the category of Best Short Subject, One Reel

award_movie.title: I Won't Play
award_movie.overview: In this Oscar-winning short film, a Marine, Joe Fingers, on a South Sea island during World War II, tells tales of the influence he's had on various personalities. In the words of one of his buddies, he's either the biggest liar in the world or the most important man in show business.

Short Subject (Two-reel).first_label: Jerry Bresler, Producer; Herbert Moulton, Associate Producer

award_movie.title: Main Street Today
award_movie.overview: This patriotic short film promotes America's war effort at home. The story looks at a fictional small town's main street, seeing where additional workforce, for increased production of materials needed by the military, might come from.

Sound Recording.first_label: 20th Century-Fox Studio Sound Department, E. H. Hansen, Sound Director

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

Sound Recording.first_label: Samuel Goldwyn Studio Sound Department, Thomas T. Moulton, Sound Director

award_movie.title: Casanova Júnior
award_movie.overview: O casamento de Cass Brown e Isabel é cancelado. E, quando ele está prestes a se casar com outra mulher, descobre que Isabel está grávida. Para que ela não entregue o bebê para adoção, Cass rapta a criança e passa a cuidar dela. Mas será que este é um plano para reconquistá-lo?

Sound Recording.first_label: Columbia Studio Sound Department, John Livadary, Sound Director

award_movie.title: O Tempo é uma Ilusão
award_movie.overview: A young turn-of-the-century newspaper man finds he can get hold of the next day's paper. This brings more problems than fortune, especially as his new girlfriend is part of a phony clairvoyant act.

Sound Recording.first_label: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studio Sound Department, Douglas Shearer, Sound Director

award_movie.title: Kismet
award_movie.overview: Hafiz, a rascally beggar on the periphery of the court of Baghdad, schemes to marry his daughter to royalty and to win the heart of the queen of the castle himself.

Sound Recording.first_label: RKO Radio Studio Sound Department, Stephen Dunn, Sound Director

award_movie.title: Music in Manhattan
award_movie.overview: Frankie Foster and Stanley Benson are a pair of small-potatoes performers. Both try to make it to the big-time after winning an amateur talent contest. Though this leads them to a few professional gigs, something is missing from their act and they are not popular. Believing a little cash will boost their career, Frankie heads for Washington, D.C. to see if her wealthy father will help them. En route Frankie is mistaken for the wife of the well-known pilot Johnny Pearson and ends up in his suite having to pretend she is his spouse. When the pilot meets her, romantic sparks fly.

Sound Recording.first_label: RCA Sound, W. M. Dalgleish, Sound Director

award_movie.title: Uma Voz na Tormenta
award_movie.overview: Former concert pianist, victim of Nazi torture, pursues a confused, melancholic existence on the island of Guadalupe.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by A. Arnold Gillespie, Donald Jahraus, Warren Newcombe; Sound Effects by Douglas Shearer

award_movie.title: Trinta Segundos Sobre Tóquio
award_movie.overview: A verdadeira e incrivelmente detalhada história de "O Raid de Doolittle", baseado no relato pessoal de Ted Lawson, um dos participantes do Raid. Atordoados pelo ataque a Pearl Harbor e uma série de outras derrotas, a América precisava de uma vitória. Para isso o coronel Jimmy Doolittle, um campeão de corrida aérea e piloto de acrobacias, elabora um plano para um ataque ousado ao coração do próprio Japão. Para fazer isso, ele deve treinar pilotos de bombardeiro do exército para fazer algo que ninguém jamais sonhou ser possível, o lançamento de 16 bombardeiros B-25, totalmente carregados de combustível e bombas, a partir de um porta-aviões! Notável em sua exatidão, este filme ainda usa imagens filmadas do raid real.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by Paul Detlefsen, John Crouse; Sound Effects by Nathan Levinson

award_movie.title: The Adventures of Mark Twain
award_movie.overview: A dramatised life of Samuel Langhorn Clemens, or Mark Twain.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by Vernon L. Walker; Sound Effects by James G. Stewart, Roy Granville

award_movie.title: Quando a Neve Tornar a Cair
award_movie.overview: A heroic guerilla group fights back against impossible odds during the 1941 Nazi invasion of Russia.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by David Allen, Ray Cory, Robert Wright; Sound Effects by Russell Malmgren, Harry Kusnick

award_movie.title: Secret Command
award_movie.overview: Sam Gallagher returns home to Los Angeles as an undercover spy for the Navy, getting a job at the shipyards where his brother, Jeff, is a foreman. Jeff still resents Sam for abandoning the family years ago and fears he may steal away Lea Damaron, his current girlfriend -- who is Sam's old flame. While Sam tries to sniff out Nazi saboteurs in the plant, he grows closer to Jill McGann, the agent tasked with pretending to be his wife.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by John R. Cosgrove; Sound Effects by Arthur Johns

award_movie.title: Desde Que Partiste
award_movie.overview: While husband Tim is away during World War II, Anne Hilton copes with problems on the homefront. Taking in a lodger, Colonel Smollett, to help make ends meet and dealing with shortages and rationing are minor inconveniences compared to the love affair daughter Jane and the Colonel's grandson conduct.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by Gordon Jennings, Farciot Edouart; Sound Effects by George Dutton

award_movie.title: Pelo Vale das Sombras
award_movie.overview: Como a varredura japonesa através das Índias Orientais, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, Dr. Wassell está determinado a escapar de Java com alguns tripulantes do cruzador Marblehead.

Special Effects.first_label: Photographic Effects by Fred Sersen; Sound Effects by Roger Heman

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: Um Barco e Nove Destinos
award_movie.overview: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial no Atlântico, um navio e um barco alemão se envolvem em um combate e ambos naufragam, mas existem alguns sobreviventes que vão para um dos botes. No entanto, eles têm diferentes origens e propósitos, mas surge o pomo da discórdia quando um dos sobreviventes se revela um nazista.

award_movie.title: None Shall Escape
award_movie.overview: Through flashbacks, the story of a Nazi war criminal is exposed.

award_movie.title: The Fighting Sullivans
award_movie.overview: The lives of a close-knit group of brothers growing up in Iowa during the days of the Great Depression and of World War II and their eventual deaths in action in the Pacific theater are chronicled in this film based on a true story.

award_movie.title: Wilson
award_movie.overview: The political career of Woodrow Wilson is chronicled, beginning with his decision to leave his post at Princeton to run for Governor of New Jersey, and his subsequent ascent to the Presidency of the United States. During his terms in office, Wilson must deal with the death of his first wife, the onslaught of German hostilities leading to American involvement in the Great War, and his own country's reticence to join the League of Nations.

award_movie.title: Hail the Conquering Hero
award_movie.overview: Having been discharged from the Marines for a hayfever condition before ever seeing action, Woodrow Lafayette Pershing Truesmith delays the return to his hometown, feeling that he is a failure. While in a moment of melancholy, he meets up with a group of Marines who befriend him and encourage him to return home to his mother by fabricating a story that he was wounded in battle with honorable discharge.

award_movie.title: Papai Por Acaso
award_movie.overview: A small-town girl with a soft spot for American soldiers wakes up the morning after a wild farewell party for the troops to find that she married someone she can't remember.

award_movie.title: Duas Garotas e um Marujo
award_movie.overview: A sailor helps two sisters start up a service canteen. The sailor soon becomes taken with gorgeous sister Jean, unaware that her sibling Patsy is also in love with him.

award_movie.title: Uma Asa e uma Prece
award_movie.overview: Um porta-aviões é enviado em uma missão de engodo pelo Pacífico, com ordens de evitar o combate, mantendo, assim, o estado de alerta japonês antes da batalha de Midway. Todos os homens têm os seus problemas e preocupações individuais, mas tornam-se cada vez mais frustrados com a sua proibição de combate, por razões desconhecidas para eles. Mas no final, todos vão ter a sua chance de lutar.

award_movie.title: O Bom Pastor
award_movie.overview: Um novo padre chega numa paróquia para substituir o antigo, e deve conseguir integrar seu estilo aos novos e antigos religiosos da congregação. Tudo parece estar indo relativamente bem, até que uma noite a igreja queima até o chão. Vencedor do Oscar de Melhor Filme.

award_movie.title: Pacto de Sangue
award_movie.overview: Um agente de seguros encontra a atraente (e casada) Phyllis quando vai efetuar um negócio e ambos logo se apaixonam. Phyllis o convence a efetuar um plano para assassinar seu marido após fazer um seguro de vida para ele. O objetivo? Ficar com o dinheiro do seguro. Mas nem tudo dá certo na execução do plano. (Estimado e 14)

Writing (Screenplay).first_label: John Van Druten, Walter Reisch, John L. Balderston

award_movie.title: À Meia Luz
award_movie.overview: Anos depois de sua tia ser assassinada em sua casa, uma jovem se muda de volta para casa com seu novo marido. No entanto, ele tem um segredo e fará qualquer coisa para protegê-lo mesmo que isso signifique enlouquecer sua esposa.

Writing (Screenplay).first_label: Jay Dratler, Samuel Hoffenstein, Betty Reinhardt

award_movie.title: Laura
award_movie.overview: Baseado em um conto de Vera Caspary, este mistério sobre o assassinato da personagem principal mostra um detetive se apaixonando pelo retrato dessa bela vítima. Ele investiga três suspeitos para tentar solucionar o crime: um jornalista, o noivo de Laura, a vítima, e sua tia.

award_movie.title: Agora Seremos Felizes
award_movie.overview: No ano que antecedeu a Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904, as quatro filhas dos Smith aprendem lições de vida e amor, mesmo que se preparem para uma mudança relutante para Nova York. Agora Seremos Felizes é muito mais que um musical. É a encantadora história de uma família na virada do século, repleta de magias e recordações. Judy Garland é Esther Smith, uma garota da agitada cidade de St. Louis que, junto com sua família, tem que se mudar para Nova York. Como se não bastasse deixar todos os seus amigos para trás, ela ainda irá perder a sensacional Feira Mundial de St. Louis de 1904. Esther precisa fazer alguma coisa para evitar essa tragédia!
